summary: Changes the Base head reference for each vampire race from the CK to use the normal head instead of the vampire head.
descriptionHtml:
Changes the Base head reference for each vampire race from the CK to use the normal head instead of the vampire head.  Didn\'t edit the Argonians and Khajiit because the creation kit showed them using the normal face already.  Doesn\'t mess with the eyes or change any textures.  

To install just put the esp file in your data folder.  Requires the Dawnguard DLC.
author: jm220
